languages.text: "Черный, как небо без звезд. Крепкий, как ваша воля, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}. С легкой перчинкой — чтобы быстрее взбодриться".

traits.locale_text: "Черный, как небо без звезд. Крепкий, как ваша воля, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}. С легкой перчинкой — чтобы быстрее взбодриться".
traits.speaker: FW_Lizzy

languages.text: "Black as a starless sky. Strong as your will, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! With a spicy touch to perk you up even faster!"
languages.original_text: "Черный, как небо без звезд. Крепкий, как ваша воля, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}. С легкой перчинкой — чтобы быстрее взбодриться".

traits.locale_text: "Black as a starless sky. Strong as your will, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! With a spicy touch to perk you up quicker!"
"Black as a starless sky. Strong as your will, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! With a spicy touch to perk you up quicker!"
"Black as a starless sky. Strong as your will, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! With a spicy touch to perk you up even faster!"

"Black as a starless sky. Strong as your will, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! With a spicy touch to perk you up even faster!"
"Black as a starless sky. Strong as your will, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! With a spicy touch to perk you up even faster!"

languages.text: "Schwarz wie der sternlose Himmel. Stark wie Euer Wille, {mf|mein himmlischer Herr|meine himmlische Herrin}! Mit einer würzigen Note, um Euch noch schneller zu stärken."
languages.original_text: "Black as a starless sky. Strong as your will, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! With a spicy touch to perk you up even faster!"

traits.locale_text: "Schwarz wie der sternlose Himmel. Stark wie Euer Wille, {mf|mein himmlischer Herr|meine himmlische Herrin}! Mit einer würzigen Note, um Euch noch schneller zu stärken."

languages.text: « Noir comme un ciel sans étoiles et fort comme votre volonté, Votre Céleste Seigneurie ! Avec un soupçon d'épice pour vous requinquer encore plus vite ! »
languages.original_text: "Black as a starless sky. Strong as your will, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! With a spicy touch to perk you up even faster!"

traits.locale_text: « Noir comme un ciel sans étoiles et fort comme votre volonté, Votre Céleste Seigneurie ! Avec un soupçon d'épice pour vous requinquer encore plus vite ! »

languages.text: 「星ひとつない空のように黒く、あなた様の意志のように強い、天の{mf|君|姫}！スパイスをひとさじ加えれば、さらに素早く元気になれますよ！」
languages.original_text: "Black as a starless sky. Strong as your will, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! With a spicy touch to perk you up even faster!"

traits.locale_text: 「星ひとつない空のように黒く、あなた様の意志のように強い、天の{mf|君|姫}！スパイスをひとさじ加えれば、さらに素早く元気になれますよ！」

languages.text: «¡Negro como un cielo sin estrellas y fuerte como su voluntad, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial! ¡Y un toque de especias para que se despeje más rápido aún!».
languages.original_text: "Black as a starless sky. Strong as your will, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! With a spicy touch to perk you up even faster!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Negro como un cielo sin estrellas y fuerte como su voluntad, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial! ¡Y un toque de especias para que se despeje más rápido aún!».

languages.text: “这杯咖啡像无星的夜空一样黑，像您的意志一样猛烈，来自上界的大人！它辛辣的味道会让您瞬间打起精神！”
languages.original_text: "Black as a starless sky. Strong as your will, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! With a spicy touch to perk you up even faster!"

traits.locale_text: “这杯咖啡像无星的夜空一样黑，像您的意志一样猛烈，来自上界的大人！它辛辣的味道会让您瞬间打起精神！”

languages.text: "Yıldızsız geceler gibi kapkara... Tam size göre Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}! Bir çimdik baharat da kattık mı sizi hemen kendinize getirir!"
languages.original_text: "Black as a starless sky. Strong as your will, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! With a spicy touch to perk you up even faster!"

traits.locale_text: "Yıldızsız geceler gibi kapkara... Tam size göre Semavi {mf|Lordum|Leydim}! Bir çimdik baharat da kattık mı sizi hemen kendinize getirir!"
